wblut.external.straightskeleton

Class Chain

  • public class Chain
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 A Chain is a set of edges colliding at a point. Described by the first corner of each face.
    Author:
    twak
